Rooms.name: Kitchen
Rooms.description: You have entered the bloody kitchen of doom. It wreaks and blood is splattered everywhere.

Rooms.name: Atrium
Rooms.description: Welcome. You are now locked inside of the haunted mansion. One of these rooms contains the key to escape. Proceed with caution.

Rooms.name: Dining Room
Rooms.description: Now you are in the dining room. Would you like to sit and eat some brain soup?

Rooms.name: Master Bedroom
Rooms.description: You are now in the master bedroom. There lies a dusty bed and blood stains on the wall. You are getting closer to your target.

Rooms.name: Bedroom
Rooms.description: Inside this room lies a babies crib. Inside the empty crib is a skeleton.

Rooms.name: Basement
Rooms.description: The dusty, dank dungeon. Spiderwebs encase every corner and hallway. In the corner there is a large door to exit needs to a key to be opened.
